title: Backend Developer Full-time
content:
About us:
Eulerity is a rapidly growing technology company providing marketing automation to small businesses and franchise systems globally.
 
Your Role:

Take an active role in developing, testing, and maintaining our backend services
Implementing new features, starting from design all the way to deployment
Help come up with new features and product ideas
Collaborate with other teams on features and releases
Assist with the preparation of documentation, training, and support of various systems
Review your peersâ€™ work through code reviews

 
About You:

You are a self-starter with at least 1 year of professional experience building backend solutions with Java
ML development experience is a plus!
Enjoy coming up with creative solutions to complex problems
Someone who enjoys learning new technologies
Comfortable working with third-party APIs
Able to work in conjunction with other team members
Willing to work in a hybrid environment (in-office and at home)

 
Benefits:

Full health benefits (medical, dental, vision)
Unlimited PTO
401k with company match
Expensed travel into office

offices.name: New York
offices.location: New York, New York, United States

questions.label: Are you legally authorized to work in the United States?
Do you now, or will you in the future, require sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g. H-1B visa status, etc.) to work legally for our company in the United States?
Are you able to commute to NYC Midtown office at least once a week?
The budgeted salary for this role is between $65K - $85K, depending on several factors. Do you acknowledge this aligns with your expectations?
Talk about a project you're proud of and steps you took to develop it. How did you determine the project was completed?
Do you have any experience testing or using testing libraries, such as JUnit?
What are you looking for in a Junior Developer position and how can you best contribute to Eulerity?
Please provide any links to your Github or Portfolio
How did you hear about this opportunity?
